title: Pohl, Kornbluth, Merril, the illustrated stories
description:
Illustrated stories from Cyril M. Kornbluth, Frederik Pohl, Judith Merril (inlcuding co-productions) and Damon Knight. Format, html, layout similar to Gutenberg. The files can be found elsewhere (minus the graphics and the original hypertexting).
